page.title: 07The Bus Service
page.content: There is a local bus service on the A74 from Lockerbie to Moffat. There are now four buses leaving Lockerbie at 10.45 am, 1.20 pm, 3.45 pm and 5.45 pm and three leaving Moffat at 11.50 am, 3.00 pm and 5.15 pm. These buses are owned by John Creighton of Moffat. There is also a bus from Johnstonebridge to Dumfries on a Wednesday, leaving at 9.30am and returning from Dumfries at 2.30pm. Several years ago there used to be two buses on a Saturday. One left Johnstonebridge at 1.00pm and one at 6.00pm returning at 5.00pm then 9.00pm. The evening bus was stopped about 15 years ago and then the afternoon one about five or six years ago. There used to be a bus from Annan to Moffat twice a week which ran up the middle through Templand on Wednesday and Saturday.
